DOC.brief_summary: This is a dose escalation study to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics of quizartinib for Japanese acute myeloid leukemia (AML) subjects.
DOC.criteria: Relapsed or refractory AML AML for which no standard treatment is available ECOG Performance Status (PS) of 0 to 2 Acute Promyelocytic Leukemia chronic myelogenous leukemia in blast phase (BCRABL fusion gene positive) History of other malignancies within 3 years prior to enrollment, except curatively treated insitu carcinoma, AML, or MDS.
